upcoming.title: Flutter Development Workshop
upcoming.description: Join us for an intensive Flutter development workshop where you'll learn to build beautiful cross-platform applications. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

upcoming.title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
upcoming.description: Comprehensive introduction to cloud computing concepts and Microsoft Azure services. Get ready for AZ-900 certification.

upcoming.title: React Native Masterclass
upcoming.description: Advanced React Native concepts and best practices for building professional mobile applications. Includes hands-on projects.

upcoming.title: DevOps Excellence Summit
upcoming.description: Learn about CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and modern DevOps practices from industry experts.

upcoming.title: AI & Machine Learning Bootcamp
upcoming.description: Comprehensive bootcamp covering fundamental concepts of AI and ML using Python and popular frameworks.

upcoming.title: Kubernetes for Enterprises
upcoming.description: Enterprise-grade Kubernetes deployment and management strategies. Learn about scaling, security, and monitoring.

upcoming.title: GraphQL Advanced Patterns
upcoming.description: Deep dive into GraphQL advanced patterns, performance optimization, and real-world implementation strategies.

enrolled.title: Web Security Workshop
enrolled.description: Learn about common web vulnerabilities and how to secure your applications against various types of attacks.

enrolled.title: Data Science with Python
enrolled.description: Master data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python's popular data science libraries.

enrolled.title: Blockchain Development
enrolled.description: Introduction to blockchain technology and smart contract development using Solidity and Ethereum.

enrolled.title: UI/UX Design Principles
enrolled.description: Learn modern UI/UX design principles and tools like Figma for creating stunning user interfaces.

enrolled.title: Cloud Computing Summit
enrolled.description: Explore various cloud platforms and learn about cloud architecture, security, and best practices.

enrolled.title: Next.js Enterprise Development
enrolled.description: Building scalable applications with Next.js, focusing on SSR, ISR, and advanced routing patterns.

enrolled.title: Swift UI Mastery
enrolled.description: Advanced iOS development using SwiftUI, focusing on animations, custom views, and app architecture.
